title: Goforbg
author: Bharadwaj Giridhar
description: Bharadwaj Giridhar's an Entrepreneur, Startup Enthusiast & Android Engineer. He's the founder of DotPush, an efficient way to agendize, automate agile meetings, writes about Startups, Tech & Finance. He's a full time Android Engineer and has shipped 8+ Android Apps to 100K+ users.
